headline: Targeting The NaV1.8 Pathway In Pain Management: Eli Lilly And Vertex Lead The Way
summary: Vertex and Eli Lilly are revolutionizing non-opioid pain management with NaV1.8 advancements. See why I'm bullish about LLY and VRTX stocks.
